channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: Joseph Nicolls also pleaded gu
item.description: Joseph Nicolls also pleaded guilty to sending a threatening email to a company which provides cameras for the scheme.

item.title: Sir Keir Starmer says the UK h
item.description: Sir Keir Starmer says the UK has a 'once-in-a-generation opportunity to reset our relationship with Europe' as he heads for two days of meetings in Berlin and Paris

item.title: Two dogs seized after a 32-yea
item.description: Two dogs seized after a 32-year-old man was fatally attacked in a back garden were XL bullies, tests have confirmed
